original_text: And when he cometh, he shall smite the land of Egypt, and deliver such as are for death to death; and such as are for captivity to captivity; and such as are for the sword to the sword.
korean_text: 그가 와서 애굽 땅을 치고 죽일 자는 죽이고 사로잡을 자는 사로잡고 칼로 칠 자는 칼로 칠 것이라

sentences.original_text: he shall smite the land of Egypt
and deliver such as are for death to death
sentences.korean_translation: 죽음에 해당하는 자들을 죽음에 넘겨줄 것이요

sentences.original_text: and such as are for captivity to captivity
sentences.korean_translation: 포로가 될 자들을 포로로 넘겨줄 것이요

sentences.original_text: and such as are for the sword to the sword
